title: Nicole Scherzinger pays tribute to her cousin John after he was killed in a hit and run
text:
Nicole Scherzinger has paid tribute to her 'sweet and beautiful' cousin John after he was killed in a 'nightmare' hit and run on Saturday.

The X Factor judge, 41, took to her Instagram page on Wednesday afternoon to appeal for information, pleading for the perpetrator of the 'tragic' crime to 'have the dignity to come forward.

John Frederick III, 35, was killed on October 26 in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, in a collision which took place around 3am.

Heartbreak: Nicole Scherzinger has paid tribute to her 'sweet and beautiful' cousin John after he was killed in a 'nightmare' hit and run on Saturday (pictured Saturday)

Tragedy: John Frederick III, 35, was killed on October 26 in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, in a collision which took place around 3am

Sharing photos of her late cousin, the former Pussycat Dolls singer wrote: 'It's like a nightmare, that we will never be able to wake from...It is with the heaviest of hearts that I say goodbye to my beautiful cousin, John Boy.

'This past Saturday October the 26th at 3am, his life was taken by a hit and run in Fort Lauderdale, FL.

'Though I must take comfort in knowing that he is at peace with our Lord, I also know the agony our family is going through, knowing someone hit him head on and just left him there to die.

'My sweet cousin, I love you so much. This world was a better place with you and your kind, creative heart in it. We will never forget you and will carry you with us forever.

Devastating: The former Pussycat Dolls singer wrote: 'It's like a nightmare, that we will never be able to wake from...It is with the heaviest of hearts that I say goodbye to my beautiful cousin, John Boy'

Appeal: The star also shared an appeal for information to track down the hit and run driver

Urging the perpetrator to come forward, she continued: 'My family and I are pleading for any information which could help support the investigation into the tragic death of this incredible man. I ask that whoever did this, has the dignity and strength to come forward.

'Our God is a loving and forgiving God, but I pray for justice for John Boy and closure for my family.'

The Hawaiian-born star is currently in the UK working on The X Factor: Celebrity- Saturday evening marked the first live show in the series.

A GoFundMe page set up to support the family describes John as a 'faithful and loving Son, Brother, Friend, Artist, Lover and Caretaker.'

Jillian Frederick, John's sister told WPLG-Ch. 10: That's my brother. He's mine and someone took him from me' while holding a photo of her sibling and pleading for the driver to come forward.

She said: 'He saw the car coming. He lost his footing and the car just plowed through him and left him there.'

Police are looking for a 2009 to 2014 silver Hyundai Sonata with front-end damage.

Investigators urge anyone with information about the hit-and-run fatality to contact the Traffic Homicide Unit of the Fort Lauderdale Police Department at 954-828-5754.

Tips can also be given, anonymously, to Broward Crime Stoppers at 954-493-8477 or online at browardcrimestoppers.org.
